bug.author: sander314
bug.summary: Multiple identical dilations lead to name error
bug.description: When using (e.g.) tcn = TCN(27,dilations=[1, 1, 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32],return_sequences=False)(in1) The code gives an error "The name "tcn_d_causal_conv_1_tanh_s0" is used 3 times in the model. All layer names should be unique." This is due to the block naming in 'residual_block' not including the layer number, but only the parameters.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sander314>@sander314</denchmark-link> good catch! Going to fix that asap
Confirmed working, thanks for the quick fix!
